definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: He blamed me for my negligence.
He cannot be trusted in the slightest degree.
sentences.chinese: 对工作我一点也不能疏忽大意。

sentences.english: Any damage resulting from negligence is not to be compensated.
sentences.chinese: 由于疏忽大意所造成的损害概不赔偿。

sentences.english: Carelessness was checked off as a cause of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 事故原因在于疏忽大意的假设被排除了。

sentences.english: If you miss out one sling inadvertently, the tally figure will be inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你疏忽大意漏掉一勾，理货数字就不正确了。

sentences.english: Do not let curiosity and carelessness kill or injure you.
sentences.chinese: 不要让好奇心和疏忽大意伤害到自己甚至丢了性命。

sentences.english: Many are caused by negligence and lax safety procedures.
sentences.chinese: 原因常常是疏忽大意和松懈的安全措施。

sentences.english: This accident was due to(owing to)his careless driving.
sentences.chinese: 这次事故是由于他开车疏忽大意造成的。

sentences.english: Many orphaned links are asign of webmaster neglect.
sentences.chinese: 许多失效的链接是一个站长疏忽大意的表现。

definition: to neglect to take precautions/relaxed vigilance
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
